notes.speech-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
INTRODUCTION: having some money is necessary, but having a lot of money is not
SUPPORTING IDEA 1: first reason
with money you can do whatever you want
SUPPORTING IDEA 2: second reason
but it's not necessary to have a lot of money
CONCLUSION: not important to have a whole lot of money

check-list.item-text: I used careful planning to outline my response.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
